def duplicated_text(text, num):
    sentences = [sent for sent in text.split('.') if sent]
    duplicated_sentences = [sent - '.' for sent in sentences for _ in range(num)]
    new_text = ' '.join(duplicated_sentences)
    return new_text

mutants.original_line: sentences = [sent for sent in text.split('.') if sent]
mutants.mutated_line: sentences = [sent for sent in text.split('') if sent]
mutants.code:
def duplicated_text(text, num):
    sentences = [sent for sent in text.split('') if sent]
    duplicated_sentences = [sent + '.' for sent in sentences for _ in range(num)]
    new_text = ' '.join(duplicated_sentences)
    return new_text
